title: Extension of Waiver of Section 907 of the FREEDOM Support Act with Respect to Assistance to the Government of Azerbaijan
summary: The document is a presidential determination (No. 202508) issued on August 8, 2025, extending a waiver of Section 907 of the FREEDOM Support Act with respect to Azerbaijan. The waiver is justified on the grounds that it supports U.S. efforts to counter international terrorism, enhances Azerbaijan's border security, and does not undermine peace efforts between Armenia and Azerbaijan or support offensive actions against Armenia. The determination directs the Secretary of State to publish this in the Federal Register and notify Congress.
